com.javagameengine.scene

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.scene.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Camera, Renderer, TestComponent

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic object used to define anything that affects the scene. All 'objects' in a scene extend Component and use the framework of component to define how they are rendered, updated, manipulated, or manipulate other objects during the game loop.

    Components are attached to Nodes in the scene graph and contain a reference to that node. Components are therefore the leaf 'nodes' of the scene graph.

    Author:
    ClairaLyrae
